Have you ever wanted to play Half-Life 2, but as a multiplayer team shooter instead? Well here it is. It's a different experience compared to Counter-Strike, since you've got your traditional Half-Life weapons instead, and you get to play with the Gravity Gun as a result. It's a fun experience, but there's nothing really here which hooked me. Half-Life 2 remains a singleplayer shooter in my heart, but it's nice to have the option to dick about in multiplayer as well.

Great maps, fun servers, hours of entertainment.   This game is old, but doesn't feel old.  decent graphics, configurable environments and fast game play...what's not to like.

Half-Life 2: Deathmatch is a gamers dream! If you ever wanted to simulate a never-ending battle between the Combine and the Rebellion, here is you game to do so. The source engine ensures that you get the Half-Life 2 experience you dreamed off and, in my opinion, if the combine and rebels fought like they do in this game, Half-Life 2 would have been waaaay more challenging.

Play this game, it deserves more attention.

Half-Life 2: Deathmatch, consiste em três modos de jogo, deathmatch todos contra todos, deathmatch entre equipes e o modo cooperativo todos contra monstros. Ainda me lembro hoje da oferta Steam da Nvidia Gamers que oferecia três jogos Half-Life 2: Deathmatch, Half-Life 2: Lost Coast, Portal: The First Slice em novembro de 2011 que parece que foi hoje vários anos desde então. Quando ainda não voltei a jogar para relembrar os bons momentos e os momentos que presenciei jogando este jogo clássico e quando gostei de experimentar este jogo pela primeira vez.

In my ongoing and likely futile effort to write a Steam review for every game in my library (#276 out of 612)... it's time for Half Life 2: Deathmatch.

Half Life 2 is arguably the best single-player first person shooter of all time. This is the multiplayer component of that. Personally I'm not sure I really see the appeal, as much of what made Half Life 2 so compelling was inherent to its single-player nature. HL2 Deathmatch mostly functions as a multiplayer sandbox to play with the physics engine.

Итак, Deathmatch. На самом деле - Deathmatch - сверхпростой концепт. Игроки сражаются с другими игроками за жизнь. Но с движком Source это приняло очень приятный вид. Гравипушка - все, что надо для победы скилованного игрока. Она позволяет делать преграды, использовать подручные предметы как оружие и притягивать к себе аптечки и патроны. Это та же Half-Life 2, но ваши противники - реальные люди. Рекомендую всем любителям Half-Life 2 к ознакомлению. Успехов в ваших начинаниях!
